scripts.ios:Pod:Reset: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod install --repo-update && cd ..
scripts.aos:clean: yarn node:clean && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.ios:clean: yarn node:clean &&  cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && yarn ios:Pod:Reset
scripts.aos:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.aos:remove:assets: rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi
scripts.aos:demoRelease-apk: yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && killall -9 java
